name: War Skull
description: You play as an awakwen skeleton from the grave to take the vengeance. Game is not completed (there is no boss, only 2 soundtracks, etc.) but i'll still appreciate all the feedback. Controls are simple: WASD or keys to move and LMB to attack. "E" to pick up the sword. All music was made by Nopeg - https://soundcloud.com/nopeg
